PMIP Messages (MSGs)

struct in6_addr get_node_id ( struct in6_addr *  mn_addr  )  [read]

Translate a IPv6 address into a mobile interface identifier.

Parameters:
[in] mn_addr The mobile address
Returns:
The mobile interface identifier in a struct in6_addr.
struct in6_addr get_node_prefix ( struct in6_addr *  mn_addr  )  [read]

Retrieve the prefix of a IPv6 address.

Parameters:
[in] mn_addr A mobile IPv6 address
Returns:
The prefix.
Note:
The prefix len is 64 bits
int icmp_na_parse ( msg_info_t *  info,
struct nd_neighbor_advert *  na,
const struct in6_addr *  saddr,
const struct in6_addr *  daddr,
int  iif,
int  hoplimit 
)

Parse ICMPv6 NA message.

Parameters:
in-out] info Storage containing all necessary informations about the message received.
[in] na Neighbour advertisement infos.
[in] saddr Source address of the message.
[in] daddr Destination address of the message.
[in] iif Interface identifier.
[in] hoplimit Hop limit value found in NA message.
Returns:
Zero.

const struct in6_addr *  daddr,
int  iif,
int  hoplimit

[in] saddr Source address of the message.
[in] daddr Destination address of the message.
[in] iif Interface identifier.

Returns:
Zero.

int mh_pba_parse ( msg_info_t *  info,
struct ip6_mh_binding_ack *  pba,
ssize_t  len,
const struct in6_addr_bundle *  in_addrs,
int  iif 
)

Parse PBA message.

Parameters:
in-out] info Storage containing all necessary informations about the message received.
[in] pba Mobility header "Binding Acknowledgment".
[in] len Length of pbu.
[in] in_addrs Source and Destination address of PBU message.
[in] iif Interface identifier.
Returns:
Zero.

ssize_t  len,

int  iif

[in] len Length of pbu.

[in] iif Interface identifier.
Returns:

int mh_send_pba ( const struct in6_addr_bundle *  addrs,
pmip_entry_t *  bce,
struct timespec *  lifetime,
int  oif 
)

Send PBA message.

Parameters:
[in] addrs Source and destination address of the message.
[in] bce Binding cache entry corresponding to the binding.
[in] lifetime Lifetime of the binding.
[in] oif Outgoing interface identifier.
Returns:
Zero if success, negative value otherwise.

Returns:
Zero if success, negative value otherwise.
int pmip_mh_send ( const struct in6_addr_bundle *  addrs,
const struct iovec *  mh_vec,
int  iovlen,
int  oif 
)

Send MH message.

Parameters:
[in] addrs Source and destination address of the message.
[in] mh_vec Storage of the message.
[in] iovlen Len of the storage.
[in] oif Outgoing interface identifier.
Returns:
Zero if success, negative value otherwise.
